## getDeviceInfo() 

获取设备信息

**Signature:**

```typescript
function getDeviceInfo(): DeviceInfoType;
```
**Returns:**

DeviceInfoType

返回设备信息

## Example


```ts
getDeviceInfo() // {"version":"537.36","plat":"macintel","type":"chrome","pc":"pc","prefix":"webkit","isMobile":false}
```
